descriptionHtml:
[size=3][size=6][font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][b][size=5]– Generals –[/size][/b][/color][/font][/size]

If you like this mod,
PLEASE FOLLOW MY BLOG: [url=http://iwilliblecha.wordpress.com/]http://iwilliblecha.wordpress.com/ [/url]
AND/OR MY FACEBOOK PAGE: [url=https://www.facebook.com/iwilliblecha]https://www.facebook.com/iwilliblecha [/url]
TO STAY IN TOUCH WITH MY WORK![/size]

Okay, I know it has been a bit since a made or at least uploaded a mod. But since I am not really a fan of New Year celebration I spent the whole night, working on a new mod! And here it is! I dont know about you, but I always thought that Belethors shop looked more then empty for a guy who would sell his own sisiter. So, I changed that. The store now looks a lot better and I think I did quite a good job. But of course, I will leave the final judgement up to you!
I hope you like it!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[youtube]MjMLtJtWeqc[/youtube][youtube]ItJuchUddI8[/youtube][youtube]iJLv-jmQVnA[/youtube]
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]– REQUIREMENTS –[/b][/size][/color][/font]

• Skyrim with latest patch

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[size=5][b][font=Arial][color=#1e84cc]– FEATURES –[/color][/font][/b][/size]

• A completely new look for Belethors General Goods!
• A new, lore-friendly Enchantment: "The Traveling Merchant". Steal Belethors Necklace to get it!
• A new, amazing layout! Should not cause probelms with npcs added by other mods!
• Changed lighting. So if you use a lighting mod, please use TES5Edit to make them work together!
• Fixed the bug that follower always use the back door (at least for me its fixed now!)
• More stuff maybe coming! Its not final!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]– General Informations – [/b][/size][/color][/font]

• Sandbox, Idel Markers, etc are moved so NPCs should work without any problem!
• All Quest items and original chairs are still inside.
• For some reason that is beyond me at the moment, some items you can only steal, others you can just take.
• The mod has been cleaned with TES5Edit and does not show any bugs so far!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[color=#1e84cc][b][font=Arial][size=5]– RECOMMENDED MODS – [/size][/font][/b][/color]

• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54825/?]The Real Warmaidens[/url]
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56126/?]The Bosmeric Drunken Huntsman Reborn/2.0[/url]
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57291/?]The Scottish Bannered Mare[/url]
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55783/?]Arcadia’s Cauldron[/url]
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49347/?]Breezehome TNF - Elianora's Flavour[/url]
• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56639/?]JK's Skyrim[/url]
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]– Credits – [/b][/size][/color][/font]

• JK for some his mods which inspired me a lot! You are indeed amazing!
• And again, I will already thank Hodilton for a video. Just a matter of time until he makes one :D

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[font=Arial][color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]– FAQs –
[/b][/size][/color][/font]
Q: Does the mod work with "insert light overhaul here"?
A: No, but you can use TEs5Edit to make them work!

Q: Will you make a bundle with all your mods?
A: Yes! (Still trying to figure out how)

Q: When?
A: No idea.

Q: Can I use your mod, upload your mod, etc?
A: Check the "use my work" section on my blog!!

Q: I would have an idea for a mod!
A: Great, then download CK and begin to work on it ;) I dont do requests!

Q: What ENB/Textures/etc?
A: Go to Youtube, search for Hodilton. I use the same ENB (changed)/mods (mostly) as he does.
author: Helixien
